results.title: Metformin: A promising drug for human cancers
results.text_hl: Epidemiological data and in vivo, and in vitro experiments have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can reduce the incidence of @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and has a strong antagonistic effect on @<m>DISEASE_Cancer_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072716 @@@metabolism-related tumors@@@.

citations.NLM: Wu H, Huang D, Zhou H, Sima X, Wu Z, Sun Y, Wang L, Ruan Y, Wu Q, Wu F, She T, Chu Y, Huang Q, Ning Z, Zhang H. Metformin: A promising drug for human cancers Oncol Lett. 2022 Jul;24(1):204. PMID: 35720480

results.title: Is it still worth pursuing the repurposing of metformin as a cancer therapeutic?
results.text_hl: This perspective article summarises how interest initially developed in the @<m>DISEASE_Cancer_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072716 @@@oncological@@@ potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and the diverse clinical programme of work to date including our contribution to establishing the intra-tumoral pharmacodynamic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the clinic.

citations.NLM: Lord SR, Harris AL. Is it still worth pursuing the repurposing of metformin as a cancer therapeutic? Br J Cancer. 2023 Apr;128(6):958-966. PMID: 36823364

results.title: Metformin and pancreatic cancer: a clue requiring investigation.
results.text_hl: However, gaps in knowledge must be addressed before @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be "repurposed" for @<m>DISEASE_Cancer_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072716 @@@oncologic@@@ indications.

results.title: Diabetes mellitus without metformin intake is associated with worse oncologic outcomes after radical nephroureterectomy for upper tract urothelial carcinoma.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes mellitus@@@ without @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intake is associated with worse @<m>DISEASE_Cancer_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072716 @@@oncologic@@@ outcomes after radical nephroureterectomy for @DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D012141 @@@upper tract urothelial carcinoma@@@.

results.title: The effect of metformin on cancer-specific survival outcomes in diabetic patients undergoing radical cystectomy for urothelial carcinoma of the bladder.
results.text_hl: Our objective was to evaluate the association between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use and @<m>DISEASE_Cancer_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000072716 @@@oncologic@@@ outcomes in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ undergoing radical cystectomy (RC) for @DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@bladder cancer@@@ (@DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@BC@@@).
